title: Split data into quartiles
sql:
with rws as (                   
  select salary,                
    width_bucket (              
      salary,                   
      min ( salary ) over (), 
      max ( salary ) over () + 1, 
      4 
    ) grp 
  from   hr.employees 
) 
  select                                     GRP   ROW#      LO      HI
    grp, count (*) row#,                   ----- ------ ------- -------
    min ( salary ) lo, max ( salary ) hi       1     68    2100    7500
  from   rws                                   2     34    7700   13000
  group  by grp                                3      4   13500   17000
  order  by grp;                               4      1   24000   24000

explanations.text:
Create four buckets; the size of the range for each is ( ( max - min ) / 4 )
Place each value of salary in the bucket where it's within min <= sal < max
